attributes.action: Cancel GCSE's and A Levels in 2021, and implement a Welsh-like moderation system
attributes.additional_details: As a student myself, we are under constant immense pressure that has led to a major deterioration in mental health and wellbeing. The government mention how exams remain the fairest way to assess pupils, and whilst that is true, they are paying the price with copious students being left with uncertainty and stress. There isn't sufficient time to complete content, and the fact that different schools and pupils are isolating at different rates makes a Welsh-Based moderation system more plausible.
attributes.background: Cancel GCSE's and A Levels in 2021, and implement a Welsh-like moderation system, in order to ensure that qualifications are still valuable to further education and employers, with moderation being both generous and fair.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066
